Uses of Package
com.communote.server.persistence.common.messages

  • Packages that use com.communote.server.persistence.common.messages 
    Package Description
    com.communote.server.persistence.common.messages  
    com.communote.server.web.commons.i18n  
  • Classes in com.communote.server.persistence.common.messages used by com.communote.server.persistence.common.messages 
    Class and Description
    MessageDao 
    MessageDaoBase
    Base Spring DAO Class: is able to create, update, remove, load, and find objects of type Message.
    MessageKeyLocalizedMessage
    Message that uses the ResourceBundleManager for localization.
    ResourceBundleChangedEvent
    Event to inform about a change in the application resource bundle resulting form add or removal of localizations.
    ResourceBundleManager
    The resource bundle manager controls the message source and takes care of providing it.
  • Classes in com.communote.server.persistence.common.messages used by com.communote.server.web.commons.i18n 
    Class and Description
    ResourceBundleChangedEvent
    Event to inform about a change in the application resource bundle resulting form add or removal of localizations.
    ResourceBundleManager
    The resource bundle manager controls the message source and takes care of providing it.
